author: Ryan Daws
description:
Germany and NVIDIA are building possibly the most ambitious European tech project of the decade: the continent’s first industrial AI cloud. NVIDIA has been on a European tour over the past month with CEO Jensen Huang charming audiences at London Tech Week before dazzling the crowds at Paris’s VivaTech. But it was his meeting with […]

The post NVIDIA helps Germany lead Europe’s AI manufacturing race appeared first on AI News.
title: NVIDIA helps Germany lead Europe’s AI manufacturing race
